description:
Founded in 2017 ICOBay Group is the global leader in the digital marketing and advertising for ICOs(Initial Coin Offerings).

HTTPS://ICOBAY.NET network consists of over 50 ICO directory platforms and over 1,000 social media pages and groups spread on Facebook, Twitter, Medium, StumbleUpon and Google+.

Our services provide prominent and immediate exposure for ICOs, blockchain companies and marketing agencies on the web and social media platforms.

We believe that the blockchain technology will change the world we live in. For this reason, we created our group of platforms to highlight projects with high potential.

Our custom rating system allow us to help investors to lower the risks for potential investments in ICOs by providing extensive information about the ICO, the team and the product behind it.
name: ICOBay Token
